summary: Implements per-sample stochastic depth (drop path) regularization for residual connections, typically used in Swin Transformer blocks. During the forward pass it randomly drops whole residual branches based on a configured probability and rescales the surviving paths to keep the expected output unchanged.
business_intent: Provide a lightweight regularization technique that improves generalization and training stability of deep vision models by randomly bypassing residual paths for each sample, thereby reducing overfitting and computational load.
